name: Chirp
tagline: Chirp is a Treebook-clone webapp from Team Treehouse
body:
### Welcome to Chirp
Chirp is an social network web app, build with Ruby on Rails.

***

| Details     |Gems used
|----------------|----------------
|* Ruby 1.9.3    |* devise
|* Rails 3.2     |* simple_form
|* Bootstrap 2.3 |* state_machine
                 |* paperclip
                 |* shoulda
                 |* factory_girl
                 |* will_paginate
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
